data.actual_result: The letters you were deleting get retyped after the emoji
data.expected_result: You select the emoji with no extra letters typed
data.short_description: Selecting an emoji from the suggestion drawer while deleting text retypes the text
data.steps_to_repro: - Type the name of an emoji in a channel - Quickly delete the text, and select an emoji while you're deleting the text - Observe your message bar after selecting the emoji
